```{r setup, include=FALSE}
knitr::opts_chunk$set(echo = TRUE)

library(tidyverse)
library(rvest)
library(readr)
library(Lahman)
library(httr)

```
```{r}
url <- "https://www.baseball-reference.com/awards/hof_2025.shtml"

page <- GET(
url,
user_agent("Mozilla/5.0")
) %>%
read_html()

raw <- page %>%
html_node("table#hof_BBWAA") %>%
html_table(fill = TRUE)

head(raw)
names(raw)
```


```{r}
raw$yearID <- 2025
glimpse(raw)
```



```{r}
write_csv(raw, "HallOfFame_2025_logan.csv")
```
